title: RV32IM_Pipelined_Processor_Group 05
description: The RV32IM pipeline processor project designs a 32-bit RISC-V processor with 5 stages: IF, ID, EX, MEM, WB. It supports RV32I base and M-extension (MUL/DIV), using forwarding, stalling, and branch prediction to manage hazards. Implemented in Verilog, it is simulated, tested with RISC-V tools, and optimized for performance.
